name: vscode-copilot-huckleberry
description: A VS Code GitHub Copilot extension that helps manage and track tasks using LLM capabilities

commands.title: Huckleberry: Manage Tasks
commands.description: Open the Huckleberry task management interface

commands.title: Huckleberry: Test Chat Integration
commands.description: Test the chat integration and diagnose potential issues

commands.title: Huckleberry: Refresh Chat Participants
commands.description: Force refresh of chat participants if they stop responding

chatParticipants.name: Huckleberry
chatParticipants.description: An assistant that helps manage tasks and project requirements

languageModelTools.name: fetch_project_info
languageModelTools.description: Retrieves information about the current project.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to fetch details about the current project based on its ID.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Fetches project information given a project ID.

languageModelTools.name: huckleberry.createTask
languageModelTools.description: Creates a new task in the Huckleberry Task Manager
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to create a new task with optional priority and due date information.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Creates a task in your project's task management system

languageModelTools.name: huckleberry.initializeTaskTracking
languageModelTools.description: Initialize task tracking for a project
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to set up task tracking for a project workspace.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Sets up the task tracking system in your project

languageModelTools.name: huckleberry.scanTodos
languageModelTools.description: Scans the codebase for TODO comments and converts them to tasks
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to scan the codebase for TODO comments and create tasks from them.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Finds TODOs in your code and adds them to your task list

pattern.description: Optional file pattern to scan (e.g., '**/*.ts'). If not provided, will scan all files.

languageModelTools.name: huckleberry.listTasks
languageModelTools.description: Lists tasks from the task manager
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to retrieve and list tasks, optionally filtered by priority or status.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Shows your current tasks with optional filtering

languageModelTools.name: huckleberry.markTaskDone
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to mark a task as complete by providing the task ID.

taskId.description: ID of the task to mark as done

languageModelTools.name: huckleberry.changeTaskPriority
languageModelTools.description: Changes the priority of a task
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to change the priority of a task by providing the task ID and new priority.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Updates the priority of a task

taskId.description: ID of the task to update

huckleberry.taskmanager.defaultTasksLoca.description: Default location for task files (relative to workspace root)

huckleberry.taskmanager.taskFileTemplate.description: Template format to use when creating new task files

huckleberry.taskmanager.defaultTaskPrior.description: Default priority for new tasks when unspecified

huckleberry.taskmanager.defaultDueDate.description: Default due date setting for new tasks

huckleberry.taskmanager.customDueDateDay.description: Number of days for custom due date setting (when defaultDueDate is set to 'custom')
